Uses of Class
retrofit2.Retrofit.Builder

  • Packages that use Retrofit.Builder 
    Package Description
    retrofit2
    Retrofit turns your REST API into a Java interface.

    • Uses of Retrofit.Builder in retrofit2

      Methods in retrofit2 that return Retrofit.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Retrofit.Builder Retrofit.Builder.addCallAdapterFactory(CallAdapter.Factory factory)
      Add a call adapter factory for supporting service method return types other than Call.
      Retrofit.Builder Retrofit.Builder.addConverterFactory(Converter.Factory factory)
      Add converter factory for serialization and deserialization of objects.
      Retrofit.Builder Retrofit.Builder.baseUrl(okhttp3.HttpUrl baseUrl)
      Set the API base URL.
      Retrofit.Builder Retrofit.Builder.baseUrl(String baseUrl)
      Set the API base URL.
      Retrofit.Builder Retrofit.Builder.baseUrl(URL baseUrl)
      Set the API base URL.
      Retrofit.Builder Retrofit.Builder.callbackExecutor(Executor executor)
      The executor on which Callback methods are invoked when returning Call from your service method.
      Retrofit.Builder Retrofit.Builder.callFactory(okhttp3.Call.Factory factory)
      Specify a custom call factory for creating Call instances.
      Retrofit.Builder Retrofit.Builder.client(okhttp3.OkHttpClient client)
      The HTTP client used for requests.
      Retrofit.Builder Retrofit.newBuilder() 
      Retrofit.Builder Retrofit.Builder.validateEagerly(boolean validateEagerly)
      When calling Retrofit.create(java.lang.Class<T>) on the resulting Retrofit instance, eagerly validate the configuration of all methods in the supplied interface.
